pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Hurdle Tobit Models // Estimation of models with zero left-censored variables. Null values may be caused by a selection process (Cragg (1971) doi:10.2307/1909582), insufficient resources (Tobin (1958) doi:10.2307/1907382) or infrequency of purchase (Deaton and Irish (1984) doi:10.1016/0047-2727(84)90067-7).
